Team Calendar

Upcoming Events

Olde Salem Days - Saturday, September 14th, 2019

The robot will be at Olde Salem Days in the Childrenâ€™s Area near the library. Come talk to the team and play catch with the robot!

More information about Olde Salem Days can be found at the Old Salem Days website: http://www.oldesalemdays.com/.

Olde Salem Days is hosted by the Rotary Club of Salem. Spartan Robotics thanks Rotary Club of Salem for their sponsorship and support.

Blue Ridge Brawl Offseason FRC Event - Friday, October 4th, 2019 to Saturday, October 5th, 2019

The Blue Ridge Brawl is an offseason FRC event hosted by Spartan Robotics (FRC 5724). It is located at Salem High School, 400 Spartan Drive, Salem, VA 24153 and is free and open to the public for spectators (on Saturday). The registration fee for teams to compete is $300.

Load-in will be Friday evening and the competition will take place Saturday. Please see https://shsrobotics.us/brb for more information.
The event's The Blue Alliance page can be found here: https://www.thebluealliance.com/event/2019vabrb
